title: Archive folders in thunderbird for android
creator: ian37
content:
Dear All, 

         At its release I set up thunderbird for Android. I am very happy with it apart from the fact I have struggled and been unable to set up archive folders as I have on my desk top version.    I find this a great boon in keeping my inbox uncluttered and accessing old information easily.    On my desktop I have folders to archive by year and by specific entities.   I am sure I am missing something very obvious so any help would be appreciated.    Kind regards Ian

title: Where are the contacts on an Android device?
creator: DorothyJ
content: I imported my profiles to my Android device, but I can't find my contacts. Should they have come in? If so, how do I access them?
